entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High plus 3.

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow or rain. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early this evening. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM MDT Saturday 1 April 2023
